summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 19V813000 (ELECTRICAL SYSTEM) HOWEVER, THE PART TO DO THE RECALL REPAIR WAS NOT YET AVAILABLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER HAD EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE DRIVING 15 MPH, THE VEHICLE STALLED WITHOUT WARNING. THE CONTACT STEERED THE VEHICLE TO THE SHOULDER OF THE ROADWAY. THE CONTACT WAITED FOR SEVERAL MINUTES BEFORE STARTING THE VEHICLE AND THE VEHICLE RESUMED NORMAL OPERATIONS. RIVER OAKS CHRYSLER JEEP DODGE RAM (4807 KIRBY DR, HOUSTON, TX 77098, (888)284-5254) WAS CONTACTED AND CONFIRMED THAT PARTS WERE NOT YET AVAILABLE. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE FAILURE RECURRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE AND INFORMED THE CONTACT TO LEAVE THE VEHICLE AT THE DEALER UNTIL THE PARTS BECAME AVAILABLE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 80,985. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
